title: Get-Paid.com
author: Get-Paid.com
content: Looks like Roobet has put the nail in the coffin tonight!They backed a true winner, Eddiesanya is just a keyboard warrior haha.Goodbye Eddiesanya

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: You mean Adesanya. Pereira as ambassador for Roobet. Sure Alex won spectacularly by KO. Congrats to Pereira. I didn't bet for him of course as I'm Izzy's fan. Upset happens all the time. But why is it that it's Roobet vs Stake fight when they are just asking these fighters to promote them?

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 13, 2022, 06:08:18 AMLooks like Roobet has put the nail in the coffin tonight!They backed a true winner, Eddiesanya is just a keyboard warrior haha.Goodbye Eddiesanya  your post made my day, I laughed so hard because I already owed that Adesanya would lose, I wouldn't consider him the keyboard warrior, but he should be a poet or a writer of poems, he says something that the person needs to decipher, now about Roobet having supported alex, it was a good decision because alex has great potential and a long way to go, in the same way that the stake was good to have supported Adesanya who until a while ago he brought good resultsQuote from: bittraffic on November 13, 2022, 06:57:20 AMBut why is it that it's Roobet vs Stake fight when they are just asking these fighters to promote them? OP is speaking in a joking tone and only in this specific fight, he is not speaking in general terms

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: This defeat is not the end for Adesanya, Adesanya will surely come back to reclaim his title back. Don't think that Israel Adesanya will back down now, although it's bizarre to lose to the same Brazilian guy three consecutive times. The first and the second defeat was around 2016 and 2017 and this one. In sports, you win and lose some. The fight continues until you decide to quit fighting totally

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on November 13, 2022, 06:57:20 AMYou mean Adesanya. No no, there is no typo here.Hint: Eddie, Stake, you got it.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 13, 2022, 06:08:18 AMLooks like Roobet has put the nail in the coffin tonight!They backed a true winner, Eddiesanya is just a keyboard warrior haha.Goodbye Eddiesanya  If you know boxing and MMA or any contact sports you know that anything can happen in the ring, I still see Adesanya as a great fighter, things like this can happen, it's just unfortunate that he loses to the same fighter, but I'm sure he will bounce back, I hope Stake will still retain Adesanya as their ambassador, Izzy still has it and he will bounce back and regain the title but it's going to be a very hard climb as its not easy to face a fighter who beat you twice in kickboxing and now in MMA.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on November 13, 2022, 08:20:02 AMThis defeat is not the end for Adesanya, Adesanya will surely come back to reclaim his title back. Don't think that Israel Adesanya will back down now, although it's bizarre to lose to the same Brazilian guy three consecutive times. The first and the second defeat was around 2016 and 2017 and this one. In sports, you win and lose some. The fight continues until you decide to quit fighting totally This is true. Many fighter becomes stronger after experiencing terrible defeat like GGG. I’m really surprised on the K.O result but I already noticed the weakness on Izzy right after he experienced his first defeat on the higher weight class. I think he should focus on his current weight and didn't spend time on aiming higher weight since his build is notfor higher weight. Alex P is verystrong and motivated on this match unlike Izzy that is just over confident that he can beat Alex.I hope that he will not loss his spirit after this upset lose. He can always have a rematch to regain his title.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on November 13, 2022, 12:53:02 PMI hope that he will not loss his spirit after this upset lose. He can always have a rematch to regain his title.He fought against him before, a rematch should be out of the picture but he should fight lower ranked fighters and hopefully make something good out of it.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 13, 2022, 08:45:05 AMQuote from: bittraffic on November 13, 2022, 06:57:20 AMYou mean Adesanya. No no, there is no typo here.Hint: Eddie, Stake, you got it.  You can't take anything away from Adesanya he's been a great champion for many years it's just Pereira is a power puncher and Adesanya cannot solve the puzzle in Pereira I don't think Stake will drop Adensanya champions do bounce back and Adesanya will bounce back, it's gambling if Stake losses on Adesanya maybe next time it's their turn to recover their losses.I'm sure there will be talks about a rematch Izzy will have to reinvent himself, if Roobet supported Pereira than congratulations to Roobet.

comments.author: ChiNgadOr
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on November 13, 2022, 08:20:02 AMThis defeat is not the end for Adesanya, Adesanya will surely come back to reclaim his title back. Don't think that Israel Adesanya will back down now, although it's bizarre to lose to the same Brazilian guy three consecutive times. The first and the second defeat was around 2016 and 2017 and this one. In sports, you win and lose some. The fight continues until you decide to quit fighting totally The fight was a great one that we all had been arguing about of who is going to be the final but it is just too shocking to see that adesanya was not able to keep his belt which he had been holding for a long time. He fight was predictive and interesting with lots of punches against Adesanya which made him lost the fight with less injuries. I will be waiting for the next fight that will come between the two warriors to see if Adesanya will he able to reclaim his belt from Pereira.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: whether kickboxing or mma, seem adesanya really is intimidated by the looks of alex that he is uneasy inside the octagon. although he'd probably won it if its just a decision but he went groggy. if the referee didn't step in, he'd sure lay flat. he'd might need 2-3 win fights before Dana can give him another shot for a rematch.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: It's certainly difficult to fight a man above your size but Pereira remains a good fighter with more power. However, Izzy is more rounded given his experience in the UFC. Though he is a weight bully so maintaining his reach on a person his size or taller is always his problem. Regardless, they both fought well and should be credited for that whether you are an Izzy or Pereira fan.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 13, 2022, 01:34:43 PMQuote from: dimonstration on November 13, 2022, 12:53:02 PMI hope that he will not loss his spirit after this upset lose. He can always have a rematch to regain his title.He fought against him before, a rematch should be out of the picture but he should fight lower ranked fighters and hopefully make something good out of it.Adesanya is 100% getting a rematch, even Dana confirms it. I expect him next time to have a wrestle-heavy game plan going into the rematch. The dude has been on top for 4years and cleared the division twice. So I think it's about time. The division needed a shakeup. Although we hope to see him bounce back stronger for a rematch.In other words, Drake loses a whooping $2m on him. He betted for Adesanya to win against Pierre.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Well you can look it that way, Adesanya being sponsored by Stake lost big against Pereira.But the real winner here is us MMA fans though, maybe it was good that Roobet brand ambassador won against Stake Adesanya, but again, this is sports so whoever crypto casinos back it this fight, it's up to us gambler who to bet and watch the fight.The fight is very exciting and the ending was spectacular and it seems that Adesanya has found his kryptonite as he has been dominating in the last couple or more years.And congrats to those who bet on the underdog.

comments.author: TopTort777
comments.body: Just wait till Pereira makes his first belt defence and lets get back to this topic  Just wait till Pereira meets someone that can dodge his left hook and has some grappling skills. So far Adesanya has punished every other trash talker. This is first loss in MMA career, so it is to early to call him a keyboard warrior. Dont forget, that that "keyboard warrior" was winning that fight, and if Pereira hasnt risked, he would have lost by UD.
